title: Practical Jewelry Design Pattern Project

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational design principles and drawing skills
context.additional_context: Practical pattern development and evaluation utilizing digital tools

learning_goals: Learners can reproduce over five fundamental pattern techniques applicable to jewelry design in practical settings
Learners can complete three types of jewelry pattern design prototypes using CAD software
Learners can submit revised pattern designs incorporating feedback during the production process that applies design principles (line, form, proportion)
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
